channel.title: System on Post It!
channel.description: Recent content in System on Post It!

item.title: System tricks
item.description: System Now I’m working on a Ubuntu 12.04 LTS Dell workstation (it has been 13.04 for a while) and a Ubuntu 13.04 Dell Laptop. See here for a list of installed packages and settings. in case of kwin problems kquitapp plasma-desktop + in case, plasma-desktop System monitoring: htop, iotop, saidar Searching grep -H '<string>' *.<ext> grep -r "<strings>" ./ sudo updatedb && locate <nomefile> Download download music from youtube
